properties.body:
GREECE TO ITALY.
20 METER S/V KRONOS GANESCHI, YELLOW HULL, ONE PERSON
ON BOARD, UNREPORTED ITHACA (38-22N 020-43E) TO
CROTONE (39-05N 017-07E). VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 581424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 3 906 592 2737, 39 065 908 4793.
